name: Shieldbrothers
description:
Shieldbrothers is a game where you defend a chain from the guards as you try to build it to save your brother. Use your mighty shield to block arrows and be reunited with your brother. 

Controls: WASD or arrow keys. In menu, use the mouse to navigate and click buttons.

All art by my awesome friend Samwell: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCMqlRNND3VeeT0yDLdxQBPQ

Game design, dev, and music + sfx by me: https://youtube.com/jhunter
